title: Football Fans, Crew Calls Steve On Vacation, Trump Tariffs, Serena Williams, Kells Ex-wife, Are You Smarter Than Tommy, Joseph VS Tommy, Carla's Reality Update, Shaq Off and more.
itunes:title: Football Fans, Crew Calls Steve On Vacation, Trump Tariffs, Serena Williams, Kells Ex-wife, Are You Smarter Than Tommy, Joseph VS Tommy, Carla's Reality Update, Shaq Off and more.
description:
The show today is dedicated to football fans. The crew calls Steve. Is The CEO acting brand new? Trump's tariffs are being discussed. Serena Williams and frequent drug testing. R. Kelly's ex-wife gives her opinion on his latest 19 minute song. Are You Smarter Than Tommy? Joseph VS Tommy. Carla's Reality update involves Kendrick, K. Michelle, Shaq and more. Have you ever heard of a Shaq-off? Fools #1 and #2 battle with their best Shaq impersonations and much more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
